title: Two Guys Walk Into A Cigar Bar...
itunes:title: Two Guys Walk Into A Cigar Bar...
description:
This week on The Cigar Authority we recap the Cigar Aficionado Top 25 and check our scorecards to see who had the best predictions. We also tell the story about how a Cigar Bar almost cost David his business….

It’s the last show of 2015 we got all the usual shenanigans.. So join us live or catch the podcast!﻿

Join us for all the madness known as The Cigar Authority!
